name: 𝔹𝕃𝔸ℂ𝕂𝕊𝕂𝕐-𝕄𝔻
description: A comprehensive WhatsApp bot with multi-device support and extensive features

OWNER_NUMBER.description: WhatsApp number of the bot owner (format: 1234567890)

SESSION_ID.description: Unique session ID for multi-device support

BOT_NAME.description: Custom name for your bot (default: 𝔹𝕃𝔸ℂ𝕂𝕊𝕂𝕐-𝕄𝔻)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of your Heroku app for keep-alive pings

APP_URL.description: Custom URL for your app if not using the default Heroku domain (optional)

KEEP_ALIVE.description: Set to false to disable keep-alive pings (default: true)

BACKUP_INTERVAL.description: Interval in minutes between session backups (default: 15)

OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY.description: API key for weather commands (from openweathermap.org)

WOLFRAM_APP_ID.description: App ID for Wolfram Alpha queries

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify Developer client ID for music-related functions

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify Developer client secret for music-related functions
